I don't know where to have a birthday party for Sam.
You had better ask him where he wants to go.
Do you know what we should eat to celebrate Thanksgiving?
I don't know what to eat.
We'd better ask mom. She knows everything!
No way. We'd better not bother her now.
She is busy taking care of the twin babies.
No, you'd better not play outside after 7.
You can watch cartoons on TV instead.
